item.title: My1stpost
item.description: Using Help and training videos Aquilon Help - Using Live vs Test –07/12–> [[23-07-12#^3e9b6e|Live vs Test]] Go-Live plan and balancing method - See: Go-Live Checklist doc. - Go-Live tasks: - A/R & A/P open invoices to be imported - Current inventory x item (OHQ, unit cost) - sub-ledgers balance to G/L in QB - Reconcile old/new systems. - P/Os expected to be received after Go-Live s/b entered into Aquilon. - S/Os expected to ship after Go-Live s/b entered into Aquilon.
